latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Role of Institution and Policies for adoption of water saving technology in China

dsDescriptionValue.value: The farm survey data was used to explore the roles of pricing policy, institutions and infrastructures for rice farmers water saving behavior using the water users group, farmers input output and water use/management data in Zhanghe Irrigation System Hubei China.

keywordValue.value: Input-output of crop production (yield, material inputs, labor, prices of inputs and outputs, disposal of production) and water management practices (frequency of irrigation, duration of irrigation, fuel use, cumulative depth of water), water user groups, price of irrigation water

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 137;
